resources.string: Airplane mode must be turned on.
The Driver Station app is obsolete.
The Robot Controller app is obsolete.
The Control Hub operating system is less than the minimum, %1$s, legal version.
The Control Hub is using its factory default password. This is extremely insecure and could result in a malicious actor deleting all Blocks and OBJ opmodes.
The device is not named properly. Refer to the Game Manual for the proper name format.
The Driver Hub operating system is less than the minimum, %1$s, legal version.
The Driver Station app is installed on the Robot Controller.
The Driver Station app is obsolete. Ensure your device has the correct date. If the date is correct, install the latest Driver Station for the current season.
The firmware version of the Control Hub and/or Expansion Hub is less than the minimum version, %1$s, specified in the Game Manual.
Turn on location services in settings.
No context available for this inspection item.
The Android OS version running on this device is lower than the minimum version, %1$s, specified in the Game Manual.
Please activate your competition config before scanning
Please connect or bind your gamepads before scanning
The Robot Controller app is installed on the Driver Station.
The Robot Controller app is not installed on the Control Hub.
The Robot Controller app is obsolete. Ensure your device has the correct date. If the date is correct, install the latest Robot Controller for the current season.
The Robot Controller SDK %1$s and the Driver Station %2$s do not match. For best results install matching, latest, versions of both.
Wifi must be enabled in order for the Robot Controller and Driver Station to communicate.
